title: Ep - 31 - Jon Gosselin
description:
Jon Gosselin discusses how the show Jon and Kate Plus 8 has impacted his life and the life of his kids as well as his upcoming performance in Atlantic City. Sonja Morgan’s former intern Rachel McMahon explains how someone can get a job working for the Real Housewife of New York. Steve Stauff reviews the season finale of Vanderpump Rules and the new Bravo show Sweet Home Oklahoma. 

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
